attributes.action: hold a referendum on the acceptability or otherwise of the EU Treaty 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tony Blair has renaged on the promise he made to UK voters when Prime Minister to hold a referendum on whether we should sign up to a European constitution.

Although it isn’t called a constitution the EU Treaty transfers more power from Westminster to Brussels. The new laws will affect the way we live for years to come.

We demand that Gordon Brown, the new Prime Minister, honours the promise made by Blair to hold a referendum for UK voters to decide if they want this EU Treaty or not.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
